plot: Through a series of interviews with eminent writers, spiritual teachers and philosophers, film maker Boris Jänsch goes on a journey to unravel what it means to be alive.
title: Who's Driving the Dreambus?
plot_es: Through a series of interviews with eminent writers, spiritual teachers and philosophers, film maker Boris Jänsch goes on a journey to unravel what it means to be alive.
plot_en: Through a series of interviews with eminent writers, spiritual teachers and philosophers, film maker Boris Jänsch goes on a journey to unravel what it means to be alive.
